entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 13. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming east 20 km/h after midnight. Temperature steady near minus 13. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 15 in the evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 05 January 2023
